name: Anno 2070: Deep Ocean
description:
Anno 2070: Deep Ocean is a strategy game developed by Related Designs. It came out on 04-10-2012. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Anno 2070: Deep Ocean is available on PC.
Alexander Roeder, Markus Schmidt and Tilman Sillescu scored the game.
